At Fri, 19 Oct 2007 09:59:44 -0700,
Michael Stack <stack@...> wrote:
>
> Its not an explicit.  It may take you a while to figure it.  Basic
> notion is that you are do a 'create' on the Heritrix MBean (Requires a
> name parameter IIRC).
> St.Ack

If you have an MBeanServerConnection:

mbsc.createMBean("org.archive.crawler.Heritrix",
                 ObjectName.getName("org.archive.crawler:name=" + name +
                 ",type=CrawlService"))

best,
Erik Hetzner
